questions.instructions: What's the advantage of fighting a Banshee on a ramp?

choices.label: Banshee feet have no grip so she can't climb it
If you are higher or lower than her, she can't hit you with her ranged attack
If you are higher or lower than her, she can't sync-kill you
Banshees can go up ramps but not down

questions.explanation: Enemies with the ability to sync-kill can only lock on to targets that are at the same altitude.

questions.instructions: What happens if you put a Heavy Barrel mod on a Carnifex?

choices.label: It has no effect
It adds the extra weight but does not increase damage
It increases damage but does not add the extra weight
It increases damage and adds the extra weight

questions.explanation: The mods that add extra weight only do so on DLC weapons, so on non-DLC weapons like the Carnifex you can get the extra bonuses on these mods "for free".

questions.instructions: Which of these is the most optimal way to reload-cancel?

choices.label: Light melee
Dodging
Entering or leaving cover
Attempting to use medigel when not downed

questions.explanation: The other methods listed might be better in certain situations but they all take time to perform, while pushing the medigel button when not downed immediately cancels the reload animation.

questions.instructions: Say an enemy is afflicted by a damage-over-time effect (DOT) from incendiary ammo dealing 50 damage each second for 3 seconds. After 1 second you shoot them again and they receive another identical DOT. How much total damage will the enemy receive from the two DOTs?

choices.label: Each DOT ticks on its own, so (50 * 3) + (50 * 3) = 300 total damage
The second DOT cancels the first, so (50 * 1) + (50 * 3) = 200 damage
The second DOT absorbs the first and combines their damage, so (50 * 1) + (100 * 3) = 350 damage

questions.explanation: Multiple instances of the same DOT have their damage combined which ticks over the duration of a single DOT. This can be exploited with a fast-firing gun like the Reegar to build DOTs that tick for huge amounts of damage quickly.

questions.instructions: On an assassination objective wave, if the first target is a difficult enemy, how can you force subsequent targets to be something easier to deal with?

choices.label: Shoot the target down as fast as possible
Finish the target off with a melee attack
Ragdoll the target off the map
Blow up the target and a lesser enemy at the same time with a cobra missle

questions.explanation: If for example the target is an Atlas and you use a cobra missle to blow it up along with an Assault Trooper, there is a high chance the next target will be an Assault Trooper due to how the wave enemy budget is calculated.

questions.instructions: What are the weak points on an Atlas?

choices.label: The shoulders, knees, groin, and canopy
The canopy and back vent
The shoulders, groin, canopy, and back vent
The shoulders, knees, groin, and back vent

questions.explanation: Shooting the plates off of the shoulders, knees, and groin will stun the Atlas and deal extra damage, and shooting the back vent deals extra damage like a headshot. The canopy is not a weak point, although if using a weapon with enough penetration you may be able to score a double hit by shooting through the canopy from certain angles.

questions.instructions: What is a unique ability of chargeable weapons?

choices.label: They don't consume ammo
They ignore armor
They are 100% accurate when fully charged
They can be fired any time, even during other actions like sprinting

questions.explanation: Once charged, weapons like the Arc Pistol can be fired any time even while sprinting, while stunned, while dodging, etc. This is also why a Geth Hunter can sometimes shoot you while stunned; its Geth Plasma Shotgun is chargeable.

questions.instructions: On wave 11, where should you hold while waiting for extraction?

choices.label: The extraction zone of course!
The middle of the map
Spread out to cover as much of the map as possible
Don't hold anywhere - instead kite the enemies around the map

questions.explanation: Enemy spawns are unlimited on wave 11 so it's easy to get overwhelmed if you stay in one spot. Instead, kite the enemies around the map in a circle such that you arrive back at the extraction point shortly before extraction.

questions.instructions: What is a unique ability of projectile weapons (as opposed to normal "hitscan" weapons)?

choices.label: They don't consume ammo
They ignore armor
They are 100% accurate when fully charged
They can be fired any time, even during other actions like sprinting

questions.explanation: Projectile weapons completely ignore any enemy armor damage reduction, making armor penetration mods on them unnecessary.

questions.instructions: Besides refilling all your ammo, what is an additional benefit of using a thermal clip pack?

choices.label: It refills all your grenades
It grants all ammo powers (incendiary, disruptor, etc) for a few seconds
It refills all your cobra missles
It increases your weapon damage by 100% for a few seconds

questions.explanation: A thermal pack will also increase weapon damage by 100% for a short time, in addition to refilling your weapon and spare ammo. It does refill grenades, but only up to 10.
